title: Dome of St. Peter's Basilica Seen from the Pincio Hill, Rome, Italy
description:
Recto:  Horizontal distant view of the done of St. Peter's Basilica shown from the Pincio Hill.  Trees are seen at left and at right in the foreground.

Verso: Horizontal view of the dome of St. Peter's Basilica and one of the towers.
name: Drawing
